Uses of Class
com.projetloki.genesis.image.Shaper

  • Packages that use Shaper 
    Package Description
    com.projetloki.genesis.image
    Library for rapidly generating CSS background images.

    • Uses of Shaper in com.projetloki.genesis.image

      Methods in com.projetloki.genesis.image that return Shaper 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Shaper Shapers.arrow(double bodyWidth, double bodyHeight)
      Returns a shaper that generates an arrow made of a rectangle and an isosceles rectangle pointing to the right.
      static Shaper Shapers.balloon(double baseLeftX, double tipX, double baseRightX, int tailHeight, Shaper box)
      Returns a shaper that generates a speech balloon made of a box on top of a tail pointing to the bottom.
      static Shaper Shapers.box()
      Returns a shaper that generates a rectangle.
      Shaper TextShape.centered()
      Returns a shaper that moves this shape to the center of the image to mask.
      static Shaper Shapers.ex(double barWidth)
      Returns a shaper that generates an X.
      Shaper Shaper.flipX()
      Returns a factory which generates a shape by flipping horizontally the shape generated by this.
      Shaper Shaper.flipY()
      Returns a factory which generates a shape by flipping vertically the shape generated by this.
      static Shaper Shapers.minusSign(double barWidth)
      Returns a shaper that generates a minus sign.
      Shaper Shaper.negate()
      Returns a factory which generates a shape by extracting the complement of the shape generated by this.
      Shaper Shaper.pad(int topPadding, int rightPadding, int bottomPadding, int leftPadding)
      Returns a factory which, given a rectangle, generates a shape fitting the rectangle minus the given borders using this.
      static Shaper Shapers.plusSign(double barWidth)
      Returns a shaper that generates a plus sign.
      Shaper Shaper.rotateCcw()
      Returns a shaper generating a shape by rotating counterclockwise the shape generated by this.
      Shaper Shaper.rotateCw()
      Returns a shaper generating a shape by rotating clockwise the shape generated by this.
      static Shaper Shapers.roundedBox(double radius)
      Returns a shaper that generates a rectangle with rounded corners.
      static Shaper Shapers.roundedBox(double radius, boolean topRight, boolean bottomRight, boolean bottomLeft, boolean topLeft)
      Returns a shaper that generates a rectangle with rounded corners.
      static Shaper Shapers.star(double spokeRatio)
      Returns a shaper that generates a five-pointed star.
      static Shaper Shapers.tail(double baseLeftX, double tipX, double baseRightX, int tailHeight)
      Returns a shaper that generates a tail pointing to the bottom.
      static Shaper Shapers.vee(double baseWidth)
      Returns a shaper that generates a V.
      Methods in com.projetloki.genesis.image with parameters of type Shaper 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Shaper Shapers.balloon(double baseLeftX, double tipX, double baseRightX, int tailHeight, Shaper box)
      Returns a shaper that generates a speech balloon made of a box on top of a tail pointing to the bottom.
      Image Image.mask(Shaper shaper)
      Returns the image obtained by making all the points lying outside the given shape transparent.
      Image Image.mask(Shaper shaper, Border... borders)
      Returns the image obtained by making all the points lying outside the given shape transparent and drawing borders around the shape.
